name: academic-examination-management-system
description: Integrated Academic and Examination Management System

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../python-ai-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test:connection: cd backend && node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const connectDB = require('./src/config/database'); connectDB().then(() => { console.log('✓ Database connection successful!'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('✗ Database connection failed:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"
